channel.title: Admin rights
channel.description: i dont know how i can get admins to spawn items without changing rights to 3 cus atm admins cant trade but can't spawn please help thanks

item.title: Admin rights
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

it works but now donators can spawn so would i just put

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights >= 2 && < 4) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 25000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); } } catch(Exception e) {

or something along those lines i dont know
yeah feel free to laugh at my noobishness in coding
